owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

ref.description: The git reference that points to the location of the devcontainer configuration to use for the permission check. The value of `ref` will typically be a branch name (`heads/BRANCH_NAME`). For more information, see "[Git References](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Internals-Git-References)" in the Git documentation.

devcontainer_path.description: Path to the devcontainer.json configuration to use for the permission check.
